detail_desc: Rib-knit hat in soft cashmere.
3/4-length trousers in stretch twill with embroidered motifs at the top, an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and frayed, raw-edge hems.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top, and a ribbed turn-up at the hem.

Short, sleeveless nursing dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access. The wrapover fastens with a press-stud. Pleats at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Braided handbag with two handles at the top and a grained imitation leather base section. Matching detachable imitation leather clutch bag with a zip at the top and lined inside. Size of handbag 12x34x37 cm. Size of clutch 16.5x23 cm.
Long-sleeved top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey. V-neck with a twisted trim.
Jodhpur boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side, an adjustable tab and metal buckle at the other side, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric with hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly and side pockets. High waist with pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt.
Vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless top in soft organic cotton jersey with a tie detail at the hem.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.
Joggers in marled sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a zip fly and button, and flap front, back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slim legs with decorative stitching at the knees.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various designs.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved Henley shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Headband in a soft, fine-knit cashmere blend with a knot detail at the front.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
High-waisted shorts in jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen, side pockets and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Slightly lower crotch and elastication at the back of the waist.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the waist and hems. One patterned pair.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication around the top and a woven double flounce that goes over the arms.
Ankle boots with rounded toes and a zip in the side. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.

Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric in a boxy style with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Drawstring in a contrasting colour at the hem.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Second layer in contrasting colour jersey at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gentle flare to the hem. Rounded hem.
Two-button jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Strappy top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, flounce at the top and a seam with a peplum at the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, lacing at the sides and gathers at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Puffer gilet in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard. Mesh-lined, zipped side pockets and covered elastic around the hood, armholes and hem. Lined. Recycled polyester filling.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a round, raw-edge neckline, raw-edge cuffs, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Calf-length dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck, sewn in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. 3/4-length dolman sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a flared skirt with a gathered tier at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and an elasticated, lace-trimmed hem.
Short fitted dress in glittery-patterned jersey with cut-out sections at the back and long sleeves.
Multi-strand necklace covered in asymmetric plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 40-48 cm.
Sturdy shoulder bag in imitation suede with a zip and shoulder strap at the top and an inner compartment. Imitation leather lining. Size 12.5x18x23 cm.

Padded, slightly longer jacket with a lined, detachable hood, stand up collar and a wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with inner ribbing, a drawstring at the waist and patch front pockets with a flap. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Round-necked jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille yarn with a velvety-smooth finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastic and a short frill trim at the top. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem. Unlined.
Chinos in soft stretch denim with a drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.

Short blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and frill trim around the neckline. Opening at the back with ties at the hem and long balloon sleeves with a seam at the elbows and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Faux fur headband with a knot detail at the front.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined, print-patterned bikini top with triangular cups and ties at the back of the neck attached to decorative rings at the front. Elasticated hem and ties at the back.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft, thermal wool blend with elasticated tops.
Pointed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Covered block heels, linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline, button placket and lace chest pocket.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a zip at the back of the neck, wrapover front and asymmetric hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
Trousers in a linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a partially reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a flap and zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x25x28 cm.
Short imitation leather skirt with a wrapover front and fastening at the waist. Lined.
Blouse in a patterned cotton weave with braided trims, a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Flower-shaped earrings in metal with faceted plastic stones. Diameter 1.8 cm.

Set with a bra and thong briefs in satin with lace details. Soft, non-wired bra with triangular cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners. Briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, slightly lower crotch, zipped side pockets and a welt back pocket.
